title: Academy Awards nominations in 2020 , by film
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of nominations. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
In general Number of nominations has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of nominations is roughly increasing from 1917 to Joker, roughly constant from Joker to Marriage_Story, and finally slightly increasing from Marriage_Story to The_Irishman.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1917 and Ford_v_Ferrari.
Maximum Number of nominations, about 11.0 was reported at Year Joker
The lowest Number of nominations, of value 4.0 was reported at Year Ford_v_Ferrari
